content: I've been thinking about getting a new winter coat for a while now, and I've been looking at both Canada Goose and The North Face. I've heard great things about both brands, but I'm not sure which one would be the best fit for me. Can you compare the two brands in terms of quality, price, and style? And by the way, I recently got a cashmere blend cardigan from Everlane, which I've been wearing non-stop to work. It's been getting a lot of compliments!
